title: YAMLResume Schema
description: JSON Schema for YAMLResume resume format.

basics.title: Basics
basics.description: The basics section contains your personal information, such as your name, email, phone number, and a brief summary.

anyOf.title: [optional] Email
anyOf.description: A valid email address or `null`.

headline.title: [optional] Headline
headline.description: A short and catchy headline for your resume or `null`.
examples: Data Scientist with a passion for Machine Learning

anyOf.title: [optional] Headline
anyOf.description: A short and catchy headline for your resume or `null`.
examples: Data Scientist with a passion for Machine Learning

phone.title: [optional] Phone
phone.description: A valid phone number that may include country code, parentheses, spaces, and hyphens or `null`.

anyOf.title: [optional] Phone
anyOf.description: A valid phone number that may include country code, parentheses, spaces, and hyphens or `null`.

summary.title: [optional] Summary
summary.description: A summary text between 16 and 1024 characters or `null`.
examples: Experienced software engineer with 5+ years in full-stack development.
Creative designer passionate about user experience and modern design principles.
Dedicated project manager with proven track record of delivering complex projects on time and budget.

anyOf.title: [optional] Summary
anyOf.description: A summary text between 16 and 1024 characters or `null`.
examples: Experienced software engineer with 5+ years in full-stack development.
Creative designer passionate about user experience and modern design principles.
Dedicated project manager with proven track record of delivering complex projects on time and budget.

url.title: [optional] URL
url.description: A valid URL with maximum length of 256 characters or `null`.

anyOf.title: [optional] URL
anyOf.description: A valid URL with maximum length of 256 characters or `null`.

education.title: Education
education.description: The education section contains your academic background, including degrees, institutions, and relevant coursework.

area.title: Area
area.description: Your field of study or major.

institution.title: Institution
institution.description: The institution that awarded the degree.

degree.title: Degree Option
degree.description: A predefined option from the available degree choices.

startDate.title: Start Date
startDate.description: A valid date string that can be parsed by `Date.parse`.

courses.title: [optional] Courses
courses.description: A list of relevant courses you have taken or `null`.

anyOf.title: [optional] Courses
anyOf.description: A list of relevant courses you have taken or `null`.

endDate.title: [optional] End Date
endDate.description: A valid date string that can be parsed by `Date.parse` or `null`.

anyOf.title: [optional] End Date
anyOf.description: A valid date string that can be parsed by `Date.parse` or `null`.

summary.title: [optional] Summary
summary.description: A summary text between 16 and 1024 characters or `null`.
examples: Experienced software engineer with 5+ years in full-stack development.
Creative designer passionate about user experience and modern design principles.
Dedicated project manager with proven track record of delivering complex projects on time and budget.

anyOf.title: [optional] Summary
anyOf.description: A summary text between 16 and 1024 characters or `null`.
examples: Experienced software engineer with 5+ years in full-stack development.
Creative designer passionate about user experience and modern design principles.
Dedicated project manager with proven track record of delivering complex projects on time and budget.

score.title: [optional] Score
score.description: Your GPA, grade, or other academic score or `null`.

anyOf.title: [optional] Score
anyOf.description: Your GPA, grade, or other academic score or `null`.

url.title: [optional] URL
url.description: A valid URL with maximum length of 256 characters or `null`.

anyOf.title: [optional] URL
anyOf.description: A valid URL with maximum length of 256 characters or `null`.

awards.title: Awards
awards.description: The awards section contains your achievements and recognitions, including awards, honors, and special acknowledgments.

awarder.title: Awarder
awarder.description: The organization or institution that presented the award.

date.title: [optional] Date
date.description: A valid date string that can be parsed by `Date.parse` or `null`.

anyOf.title: [optional] Date
anyOf.description: A valid date string that can be parsed by `Date.parse` or `null`.

summary.title: [optional] Summary
summary.description: A summary text between 16 and 1024 characters or `null`.
examples: Experienced software engineer with 5+ years in full-stack development.
Creative designer passionate about user experience and modern design principles.
Dedicated project manager with proven track record of delivering complex projects on time and budget.

anyOf.title: [optional] Summary
anyOf.description: A summary text between 16 and 1024 characters or `null`.
examples: Experienced software engineer with 5+ years in full-stack development.
Creative designer passionate about user experience and modern design principles.
Dedicated project manager with proven track record of delivering complex projects on time and budget.

certificates.title: Certificates
certificates.description: The certificates section contains your professional certifications, including training programs and industry-recognized credentials.

issuer.title: Issuer
issuer.description: The organization that issued the certificate.

date.title: [optional] Date
date.description: A valid date string that can be parsed by `Date.parse` or `null`.

anyOf.title: [optional] Date
anyOf.description: A valid date string that can be parsed by `Date.parse` or `null`.

url.title: [optional] URL
url.description: A valid URL with maximum length of 256 characters or `null`.

anyOf.title: [optional] URL
anyOf.description: A valid URL with maximum length of 256 characters or `null`.

interests.title: Interests
interests.description: The interests section contains your personal interests and hobbies, including activities and topics you are passionate about.

keywords.title: [optional] Keywords
keywords.description: An array of keyword, each between 1 and 32 characters or `null`.

anyOf.title: [optional] Keywords
anyOf.description: An array of keyword, each between 1 and 32 characters or `null`.

languages.title: Languages
languages.description: The languages section contains your language proficiencies, including fluency levels and related skills.

fluency.title: Fluency Option
fluency.description: A predefined option from the available fluency choices.

language.title: Language Option
language.description: A predefined option from the available language choices.

keywords.title: [optional] Keywords
keywords.description: An array of keyword, each between 1 and 32 characters or `null`.

anyOf.title: [optional] Keywords
anyOf.description: An array of keyword, each between 1 and 32 characters or `null`.

location.title: Location
location.description: The location section contains your geographical information, such as city, address, country, and postal code.

city.title: City
city.description: The city where you are located.

address.title: [optional] Address
address.description: Your full address including street, apartment, etc or `null`.

anyOf.title: [optional] Address
anyOf.description: Your full address including street, apartment, etc or `null`.

country.title: [optional] Country Option
country.description: A predefined option from the available country choices or `null`.

anyOf.title: [optional] Country Option
anyOf.description: A predefined option from the available country choices or `null`.

postalCode.title: [optional] Postal Code
postalCode.description: Your postal or ZIP code or `null`.

anyOf.title: [optional] Postal Code
anyOf.description: Your postal or ZIP code or `null`.

region.title: [optional] Region
region.description: Your state, province, or region or `null`.

anyOf.title: [optional] Region
anyOf.description: Your state, province, or region or `null`.

profiles.title: Profiles
profiles.description: The profiles section contains your online presence, including social media and professional network profiles.

network.title: Network Option
network.description: A predefined option from the available network choices.

username.title: Username
username.description: Your username or handle on the social network.

url.title: [optional] URL
url.description: A valid URL with maximum length of 256 characters or `null`.

anyOf.title: [optional] URL
anyOf.description: A valid URL with maximum length of 256 characters or `null`.

projects.title: Projects
projects.description: The projects section contains your personal and professional projects, including technical details, timelines, and outcomes.

startDate.title: Start Date
startDate.description: A valid date string that can be parsed by `Date.parse`.

description.title: [optional] Description
description.description: A detailed description of the project and your role or `null`.
examples: Led development of a full-stack web application
Designed and implemented REST API endpoints
Managed team of 5 developers for mobile app development

anyOf.title: [optional] Description
anyOf.description: A detailed description of the project and your role or `null`.
examples: Led development of a full-stack web application

endDate.title: [optional] End Date
endDate.description: A valid date string that can be parsed by `Date.parse` or `null`.

anyOf.description: A valid date string that can be parsed by `Date.parse` or `null`.

keywords.description: An array of keyword, each between 1 and 32 characters or `null`.

anyOf.description: An array of keyword, each between 1 and 32 characters or `null`.

url.title: [optional] URL
url.description: A valid URL with maximum length of 256 characters or `null`.

anyOf.title: [optional] URL
anyOf.description: A valid URL with maximum length of 256 characters or `null`.

publications.title: Publications
publications.description: The publications section contains your academic and professional publications, including papers, articles, and research works.

publisher.title: Publisher
publisher.description: The organization that published the work.

releaseDate.title: [optional] Release Date
releaseDate.description: A valid date string that can be parsed by `Date.parse` or `null`.

anyOf.title: [optional] Release Date
anyOf.description: A valid date string that can be parsed by `Date.parse` or `null`.

summary.description: A summary text between 16 and 1024 characters or `null`.
examples: Experienced software engineer with 5+ years in full-stack development.

anyOf.title: [optional] Email

anyOf.description: Your professional relationship with the reference or `null`.

skills.description: The skills section contains your technical and professional skills, including proficiency levels and related keywords.

anyOf.description: An array of keyword, each between 1 and 32 characters or `null`.

volunteer.description: The volunteer section contains your community service and volunteer work, including organizations, roles, and contributions.

position.description: Your role or position in the volunteer organization.

startDate.description: A valid date string that can be parsed by `Date.parse`.

work.title: Work
work.description: The work section contains your professional experience, including job titles, companies, and responsibilities.

name.title: Name
name.description: The name of the company or organization you worked for.

position.title: Position
position.description: Your job title or position at the company.

startDate.title: Start Date
startDate.description: A valid date string that can be parsed by `Date.parse`.

layout.title: Layout
layout.description: The layout section contains all layout-related configurations, including LaTeX, locale, margins, template, typography, etc.

latex.title: LaTeX
latex.description: The LaTeX section contains LaTeX-specific settings, including fontspec package configurations.

numbers.title: [optional] Fontspec Numbers Option
numbers.description: A predefined option from the available fontspec numbers choices or `null`.

anyOf.title: [optional] Fontspec Numbers Option
anyOf.description: A predefined option from the available fontspec numbers choices or `null`.

locale.title: Locale
locale.description: The locale section contains locale language settings, determining the language used for the resume.

language.title: [optional] Locale Language Option
language.description: A predefined option from the available locale language choices or `null`.

anyOf.title: [optional] Locale Language Option
anyOf.description: A predefined option from the available locale language choices or `null`.

margins.title: Margins
margins.description: The margins section contains page margin settings, including top, bottom, left, and right margins.

top.title: [optional] Top Margin Size
top.description: A positive number followed by valid units: cm, pt, or in. Examples: "2.5cm", "1in", "72pt" or `null`.

anyOf.title: [optional] Top Margin Size
anyOf.description: A positive number followed by valid units: cm, pt, or in. Examples: "2.5cm", "1in", "72pt" or `null`.

bottom.title: [optional] Bottom Margin Size
bottom.description: A positive number followed by valid units: cm, pt, or in. Examples: "2.5cm", "1in", "72pt" or `null`.

anyOf.title: [optional] Bottom Margin Size
anyOf.description: A positive number followed by valid units: cm, pt, or in. Examples: "2.5cm", "1in", "72pt" or `null`.

left.title: [optional] Left Margin Size
left.description: A positive number followed by valid units: cm, pt, or in. Examples: "2.5cm", "1in", "72pt" or `null`.

anyOf.title: [optional] Left Margin Size
anyOf.description: A positive number followed by valid units: cm, pt, or in. Examples: "2.5cm", "1in", "72pt" or `null`.

right.title: [optional] Right Margin Size
right.description: A positive number followed by valid units: cm, pt, or in. Examples: "2.5cm", "1in", "72pt" or `null`.

anyOf.title: [optional] Right Margin Size
anyOf.description: A positive number followed by valid units: cm, pt, or in. Examples: "2.5cm", "1in", "72pt" or `null`.

page.title: Page
page.description: The page section contains page display settings, including whether to show page numbers.

showPageNumbers.title: [optional] Show Page Numbers
showPageNumbers.description: Whether to show page numbers on the page or `null`.

anyOf.title: [optional] Show Page Numbers
anyOf.description: Whether to show page numbers on the page or `null`.
